name: Piloswine
description: Because the long hair all over its body obscures its sight, it just keeps charging repeatedly.

abilities.name: Oblivious
abilities.effect: This Pokémon cannot be infatuated and is immune to captivate.  If a Pokémon is infatuated and acquires this ability, its infatuation is cleared.

abilities.name: Snow Cloak
abilities.effect: During hail, this Pokémon has 1.25× its evasion, and it does not take hail damage regardless of type.  The evasion bonus does not count as a stat modifier.  Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is halved in snow.

abilities.name: Thick Fat
abilities.effect: This Pokémon takes half as much damage from fire- and ice-type moves.
